summary: How does VA oversee the distribution of controlled substances? The Veterans Health Administration requires that its medical facilities have an inspection program to monitor how controlled substances are dispensed by staff. Inspectors check, for example, that opioids removed from dispensing machines by staff have a valid doctor’s order and are administered to patients. However, we found that some VHA facilities did not follow all required...
title: VA Health Care: Actions Needed to Ensure Medical Facility Controlled Substance Inspection Programs Meet Agency Requirements
